events.eventDescription: Imicimbi yabelwa amabhizinisi endawo, izinhlangano nemiphakathi.

hero.title: Thola ukwesekwa kwendawo okubalulekile nemicimbi
hero.subtitle: Hlola iqoqo lezinsiza zendawo ezihlonziwe ezenzelwe ukuhlangabezana nezidingo zomphakathi wakho ezihlukile.
hero.supportSubtitle: Uhulumeni bendawo, izinhlangano zentsha kazwelonke kanye nomkhakha wangasese.

footer.address: 143 West Street, Sandown, Sandton, Gauteng, South Africa

services.title: Ongakwenza futhi uthole enkundleni yethu
services.subtitle: Kungakhathalekile ukuthi ufuna ukwesekwa, imicimbi, noma ukuxhumana.

steps.title: Umphakathi
steps.description: Xhuma nabantu abanemibono efanayo emphakathini wakho, yabelana ngezinsiza, futhi uhlale uxhumekile.

steps.title: Imicimbi Yomphakathi
steps.description: Ungaphuthelwa imicimbi yomphakathi ebalulekile nemicimbi yenethiwekhi.

steps.title: Imisebenzi & Ukuqeqeshwa
steps.description: I-NGO zethu zikusize ukuthi ufake izicelo zemisebenzi, ufunde ngemisebenzi, futhi uthuthukise amakhono akho.

steps.title: Ukuxhumana
steps.description: Ama-blogomphakathi kanye neforamu ukuze wabelane ngemibono, ubuze imibuzo, futhi uxhumane nabanye.

subscribe.title: Bhalisa kwincwadi yezindaba
subscribe.description: Hlala unolwazi ngemisebenzi emisha, imicimbi nezinsiza ezintsha ezithunyelwa nsuku zonke kuma-foramu kanye namabhulogi omphakathi wakho.

faq.title: Imibuzo Evame Ukubuzwa
faq.subtitle: Uma imibuzo yethu ingaphendulwa lapha, zizwe ukhululekile ukuxhumana nokwesekwa kwethu ukuze uthole usizo.

questions.question: Iyini i-Sisonke AI-Navigation yezinsiza?
questions.answer: Isicelo sakho sihamba ngqo kothimbeni ozosebenza nalo. Ungakwazi ukuphatha zonke izicelo zakho endaweni eyodwa, ufake isicelo ngama-clicks amabili futhi uthole impendulo kuthimba phakathi kwezinsuku ezimbalwa.

questions.question: Hlobo luni lolwazi oluhlinzekwa inkundla ye-Sisonke?
questions.answer: I-Career inikeza uhla olubanzi lwemisebenzi kuwo wonke imikhakha nemisebenzi ehlukahlukene. Ungathola izikhundla kwezobuchwepheshe, ezokukhangisa, ezimali, umklamo, nezinye izimboni eziningi.

questions.question: Iziphi izindawo zomphakathi ezisekelwa yi-Sisonke? Futhi ngingakha iphrofayili?
questions.answer: Yebo, i-Career iyinkundla yamahhala kubafunayo umsebenzi. Ungakha iphrofayili, useshe imisebenzi futhi ufake izicelo zezikhundla ngaphandle kwezindleko.

questions.question: Ingabe imisebenzi ebekwe kwi-Sisonke ihlolwe?
questions.answer: Yebo, i-Career iyinkundla yamahhala kubafunayo umsebenzi. Ungakha iphrofayili, useshe imisebenzi futhi ufake izicelo zezikhundla ngaphandle kwezindleko.

questions.question: Ingabe amabhizinisi abekwe kwi-Sisonke athembekile?
questions.answer: Yebo, i-Career iyinkundla yamahhala kubafunayo umsebenzi. Ungakha iphrofayili, useshe imisebenzi futhi ufake izicelo zezikhundla ngaphandle kwezindleko.
